headline: Major South Florida Contract Wins Might Change The Case For Investing In Tutor Perini (TPC)
summary: Tutor Perini Corporation announced it has secured new mechanical services contracts worth US$154.6 million for major South Florida developments, including Bentley Residences, 1428 Brickell Avenue, JEM Miami Worldcenter, and Namdar Tower 2, with project completion expected by the second quarter of 2028. This contract win expands the company’s Q3 2025 backlog at a time when Tutor Perini faces ongoing financial challenges and heightened market scrutiny regarding its future stability. We'll...
